code: import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./reducers";var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export default store;
